summary: Selfish Chris Teller pressures his older brother, a retired climber, to accompany him on a treacherous Alpine climb to loot the bodies of plane crash victims.
cast: Spencer Tracy|Robert Wagner|Claire Trevor|William Demarest|Barbara Darrow|Richard Arlen|E.G. Marshall|Anna Kashfi|Richard Garrick|Harry Townes|Stacy Harris|Yves Brainville|Mary Adams|Richard H. Cutting|René Havard|Jim Hayward|François Valorbe
keywords: two word title|jeep|herd of sheep|family home|older man younger woman relationship
title: La montaña siniestra
